name: 神位纷争HD ~ Ragnania HD
description: Ragnania HD is an online game developed by Beijing Smile Technology Co., Ltd. using the "Team Action Battle" mode. Players can freely move around in an open 3D closed field through a combination of sprinting, jumping, and flying operations, dodge bullets, get close to enemies, and use hard-core fighting melee combos or a variety of long-range techniques to knock down opponents. Win the game with the score within the ultra-short time limit of 180 seconds.
